caption: This stunning ensemble features a beautiful black Anarkali kurta in viscose rayon fabric with intricate ethnic motifs, screen-printed for a captivating look. The kurta showcases a flared hemline and a mandarin collar, complemented by three-quarter regular sleeves that add an elegant touch. Paired with slip-on printed palazzos of the same fabric, this festive outfit exudes an Indie Prints main trend. The look is completed with a matching viscose rayon dupatta that has a solid border and is adorned with ethnic motif prints, making it a perfect choice for festive occasions. The elasticated waistband ensures comfort, while the machine wash care and ready-to-wear stitch emphasize convenience. This ensemble blends traditional aesthetics with contemporary style effortlessly.

This fashionable ensemble exudes a fusion of traditional elegance and modern style. Featuring a calf-length A-line kurta crafted from soft viscose rayon, it boasts a solid hue with a flared hemline and a chic square neck. Complementing the kurta are matching palazzos secured with a zip closure and designed from viscose rayon for a comfortable fit. The sleeveless top with shoulder straps adds a casual yet sophisticated touch. Elevating the outfit is an organza dupatta adorned with a vibrant printed border, creating a striking contrast. Ideal for fusion occasions, this ready-to-wear piece offers a blend of comfort and style. Hand wash care ensures it maintains its charm, while the elasticated waistband provides ease of wear.

This elegant ensemble features an exquisite printed kurta set crafted from luxurious viscose rayon fabric. The A-line kurta showcases a sophisticated round neck and three-quarter sleeves with intricate thread work, embodying traditional ethnic motifs. Its flared hemline beautifully complements the above-knee length, creating a flowy and graceful silhouette.

Paired with slip-on trousers that boast a printed pattern, this outfit ensures both comfort and style, with an elasticated waistband for a snug fit. The accompanying voile dupatta, adorned with delicate embroidery and bordered with charming tassels, adds a captivating touch to the overall look. Perfect for daily occasions, this ready-to-wear set combines traditional aesthetics with modern sensibilities, making it a delightful addition to any wardrobe.

Elevate your daily wardrobe with this stunning ethnic ensemble. Crafted from pure cotton, the rich red Anarkali kurta features a round neck, three-quarter regular sleeves, and showcases an exquisite printed pattern with ethnic motifs. Its empire design styling and flared hemline add a touch of elegance, while the front slit enhances its graceful appeal. The matching printed trousers offer a comfortable, slip-on fit with an elasticated waistband, ensuring ease of wear. Completing the look is a cotton blend dupatta adorned with a matching printed border. This ready-to-wear outfit is perfect for adding a vibrant touch to your everyday style. Hand wash recommended.

This elegant garment is a monochrome ethnic printed kurta, perfect for daily wear. It features a comfortable and chic round neck with three-quarter regular sleeves that provide ease of movement. The straight hemline and side slits add a touch of modern style. Tailored from pure cotton fabric, this calf-length kurta ensures a soft feel and breathability. The intricate ethnic motifs printed on it enhance its traditional appeal, making it a versatile piece for any day. Easy to maintain, it is machine washable and ready to wear.

This exquisite Anarkali dress, perfect for daily wear, effortlessly merges traditional elegance with modern style. Crafted from pure georgette fabric, the garment showcases a rich earthy hue, accentuated by intricate thread work and a woven design pattern. It features a pleated design styling that adds a touch of sophistication and a flared hemline that gently flows to ankle length. The dress comes with a mandarin collar and long, regular sleeves, enhancing its refined look. Practicality meets style with the front slit detail, offering ease of movement. Ready to wear and easy to maintain with a simple hand wash, this dress epitomizes comfort and chicness for any occasion.

This chic fusion ensemble features a printed Anarkali kurta and palazzo set, crafted from pure cotton for a comfortable and breathable fit. The kurta boasts large floral patterns and Gotta Patti ornamentation, adding a touch of elegance to its design. It also includes a keyhole neck and three-quarter regular sleeves with pleated, flared hemline styling for a sophisticated look. The palazzos complement with matching floral prints and a partially elasticated waistband for a perfect fit. Completing the ensemble is a beautifully printed cotton dupatta. Ideal for a sister's housewarming or any festive occasion, pair it with Mod Indo-Western danglers, a sparkly pair of mojris, and an elaborate choker neckpiece for a stunning look. Machine washable for easy care.

Bring elegance to festive occasions with this exquisite ensemble. The outfit features a stunning poly crepe kurta adorned with a large floral print, highlighted by intricate gotta patti ornamentation. The kurta's round neck and long, regular sleeves flow gracefully to a calf-length hemline, completed with side slits for added comfort. Complementing the kurta are the printed poly crepe palazzos with a partially elasticated waistband, ensuring a comfortable fit. Adding a touch of sophistication, the net dupatta comes with a charming printed pattern and tassel border. Perfectly styled for festive celebrations and fun destination weddings, pair it with long studded danglers, a glittering minaudiere, and an exquisite open bangle for a truly memorable look. Machine washable for easy care, this ready-to-wear outfit embodies a chic blend of tradition and contemporary style.

Elevate your daily wardrobe with this stylish mustard yellow kurta and palazzo set, crafted from pure cotton for utmost comfort. The knee-length kurta features a chic round neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, adorned with a large coverage floral print. Designed in a straight shape with side slits, it boasts a straight hemline for a flattering fit. Complementing the kurta, the printed palazzos add a touch of elegance with their partially elasticated waistband, ensuring ease of wear. Perfect for any casual occasion, this ready-to-wear ensemble seamlessly blends comfort with contemporary style. Machine washable for easy care, this outfit is a delightful addition to your everyday fashion collection.

This exquisite daily wear ensemble is a perfect blend of comfort and elegance. Featuring a printed A-line kurta made from pure cotton fabric, it boasts a flared hemline and a round neck, complemented by three-quarter regular sleeves adorned with intricate ethnic motifs. The kurta extends to a graceful calf length, creating a flowing silhouette. The palazzos, also crafted from pure cotton, have an elasticated waistband for a secure and comfortable slip-on fit. They continue the ethnic motif pattern with a printed design. 

Adding a pop of color, the silk chiffon dupatta comes with a solid design and tape border detailing, rounding off the traditional look with finesse. The gotta patti ornamentation adds a touch of sparkle, making this outfit suitable for daily wear as well as special occasions. This ready-to-wear set is machine washable, ensuring easy maintenance without compromising on style.

This delightful outfit exudes charm and elegance, perfect for daily wear. The kurta, crafted from pure cotton, features an A-line silhouette with a straight hemline and a calf-length design. It showcases a lovely floral print, complemented by large pattern coverage and regular short sleeves. The keyhole neck adds a subtle touch of sophistication.

Paired with this is a comfortable slip-on trouser, also fashioned from pure cotton. These trousers exhibit a printed pattern, and the waistband is partially elasticated for ease of wear. The soft, breathable fabric ensures comfort while maintaining an elegant look. This ready-to-wear ensemble is ideal for casual outings, presenting a perfect blend of style and comfort. Machine wash care ensures easy maintenance.

This chic, calf-length kurta is crafted from pure cotton fabric, ensuring a comfortable and breathable wear ideal for daily use. It features a vibrant, bright color complemented by exquisite thread work on the front, creating a charming floral embroidered pattern. The straight hemline and side slits offer ease of movement, while the three-quarter regular sleeves and round neck underline its classic, timeless design. The overall straight shape and ready-to-wear stitch make it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Best maintained with dry clean care, this kurta combines elegance with practical daily fashion.

Introducing a stunning festive ensemble featuring a rich poly-silk kurta with a keyhole neckline and intricate ethnic motif designs on the yoke. This A-line, calf-length kurta showcases a flared hemline and is accentuated by its elegant panelled styling and multiple slits, which add a touch of sophistication and movement. The three-quarter regular sleeves provide a balanced look, making it perfect for celebratory occasions.

Complementing the kurta are solid poly-silk trousers with a comfortable partially elasticated waistband and a zip closure for a flattering fit. This ensemble includes a beautifully printed art silk dupatta, featuring an exquisite taping border that enhances the overall ethnic appeal.

Designed for comfort and style, this ready-to-wear set requires simple hand washing to maintain its delicate fabric and intricate patterns. Whether you're attending a festive gathering or a special event, this ensemble promises to make a statement with its luxurious fabric, intricate designs, and elegant silhouette.

This stylish outfit features a beautiful indigo kurta adorned with a delicate floral print, crafted from pure cotton for a breathable and comfortable fit. The kurta is designed with a mandarin collar and three-quarter roll-up sleeves, adding a touch of contemporary flair. It boasts a straight hemline and side slits, extending to calf length, providing a relaxed yet elegant silhouette. Paired with equally comfortable palazzos that feature an eye-catching printed pattern and an elasticated waistband for a slip-on ease, this ensemble is perfect for daily wear. The top and bottom fabric are screen printed, ensuring long-lasting colors and design fidelity. This ready-to-wear set is machine washable, making it ideal for regular use. Embrace the main trend of indigo with this casually chic and effortlessly stylish look.

This elegant ensemble features a kurta crafted from soft viscose rayon, adorned with exquisite mirror work and ethnic motifs. The kurta showcases a straight fit with a round neck, three-quarter regular sleeves, and a calf-length with side slits for ease of movement. The yoke design on the kurta is complemented by a solid viscose rayon slip-on trouser that has a partially elasticated waistband for added comfort. The outfit is completed with a delicate poly chiffon dupatta, echoing the solid pattern of the trousers. Ideal for festive occasions, this ready-to-wear set melds traditional charm with modern comfort, making it a perfect choice for wedding guests or gifting. The thoughtful design, including the two pockets, ensures practicality without compromising on style. Hand wash recommended for maintaining its pristine look.

This elegant ensemble features a sophisticated silk blend kurta adorned with exquisite thread work and ethnic motifs on the yoke and borders. The kurta boasts a timeless mandarin collar and three-quarter sleeves, styled with regular fit and side slits for added ease. It extends to a flattering calf length and is paired with solid silk blend trousers that come with a drawstring and partially elasticated waistband for a comfortable fit. The trousers are complemented by intricate detailing at the hems.

Completing the look, the set includes a luxurious printed silk chiffon dupatta with delicate tassel borders, adding a chic touch to the outfit. This ready-to-wear outfit is perfect for daily occasions, reflecting traditional charm with a modern twist. Dry clean only for maintaining its finesse. Ideal for brides and their wedding squads.

This elegant daily-wear outfit features a bright, floral-printed kurta made from pure cotton fabric. The round neck is adorned with Gotta Patti ornamentation, adding a touch of sophistication to the screen-printed design. The kurta showcases three-quarter regular sleeves and a straight shape with side slits, offering a comfortable fit for everyday use. The straight hemline falls to a calf length, suitable for various body shapes. Paired with a white, tiered, layered skirt, this ensemble effortlessly balances traditional aesthetics with modern flair. Hand wash is recommended to maintain the vibrant floral pattern and the overall quality of the garment.

This stylish ensemble features a calf-length, straight-shaped dress in a soothing pastel color with a charming floral print. Made from pure cotton with a straight hemline and side slits, it promises comfort and breathability, making it perfect for daily wear. The dress boasts a keyhole neck and roll-up, three-quarter sleeves, enhancing its regular design styling. The fabric is machine woven and designed for easy maintenance with machine wash care. This ready-to-wear piece pairs beautifully with a contrasting white bottom, offering a blend of elegance and comfort for everyday occasions.

Embrace effortless elegance with this stunning calf-length A-line dress in a monochrome color family. Crafted from luxurious viscose rayon fabric, this dress features a captivating Bandhani-inspired printed pattern with intricate foil print accents. The flared hemline adds a touch of sophistication, while the sleeveless design and side slits ensure maximum comfort for daily wear. The mandarin collar is adorned with chic button detailing, making it a perfect ensemble for any occasion. This ready-to-wear garment is an essential addition to your wardrobe, promising both style and practicality. Machine washable for easy care.

This elegant dress perfectly epitomizes everyday sophistication, crafted from a comfortable and blended Viscose Rayon fabric. Displaying a rich earthy color, it features a calf-length straight hemline with side slits, making it ideal for daily wear. The intricate floral embroidery adds a touch of ornamentation, while the three-quarter regular sleeves and boat neck design enhance its classic appeal. The straight silhouette, enhanced by the embroidered motive scattered across, emanates a refined yet relaxed vibe. A must-have piece that combines traditional embellishment with contemporary styling. For optimal care, follow the washcare label on the garment, use cold water with mild detergents, avoid wringing, and dry flat or hang.

This elegant ensemble epitomizes festive sophistication with a stunning floor-length A-line kurta made of poly georgette. The kurta, featuring a panelled design and flared hemline, showcases intricate geometric embroidery throughout, contributing to its large pattern coverage. The round neck and long regular sleeves lend a traditional yet timeless appeal, accentuated with delicate gold detailing. Complementing the kurta is a solid silk blend churidar for effortless elegance, accompanied by a beautifully bordered net dupatta that drapes gracefully. Ideal for festive occasions, this ready-to-wear outfit ensures both style and comfort with an elasticated waistband on the churidar and a regular machine weave. Hand wash care maintains its pristine condition, making it an excellent choice for wedding events and gifting.

Presenting a gorgeous three-piece ensemble perfect for daily wear, exuding traditional charm with a modern twist. The kurta features a delicate round neck, straight calf-length fit, and three-quarter regular sleeves. It is adorned with beautiful indigo ethnic motifs printed on high-quality viscose rayon fabric, and accented with side slits for added comfort. The straight-cut trousers, also slip-on and crafted from viscose rayon, echo the kurta's printed pattern for a cohesive look. Completing the outfit is a chic dupatta with a solid border and printed design, made from the same soft fabric. This ready-to-wear set is machine washable, making it a practical yet stylish addition to your wardrobe.

Showcasing a charming ensemble perfect for daily wear, this outfit is made from sustainable pure cotton fabric ensuring utmost comfort. The top features a flattering A-line shape with a V-neck and a pleated yoke design. It is adorned with large floral prints and has short, flared sleeves for a touch of elegance. The top extends to an above-knee length with a curved hemline, making it versatile for various body shapes. Complemented with a matching printed skirt that has an elasticated waistband and zip closure, this outfit ensures a seamless fit. The set is complete with a printed dupatta featuring an intricate border, enhancing its overall appeal. Easy to maintain, this ready-to-wear ensemble can be effortlessly machine washed.

This ensemble features a festive pure cotton kurta set with a straight-cut calf-length kurta showcasing ethnic motifs in a beautiful printed pattern. The kurta, adorned with a mandarin collar and three-quarter regular sleeves, is paired with matching palazzo pants. The side slits add a touch of elegance, enhancing its ready-to-wear charm. Completing the outfit, a printed pure cotton dupatta with an intricate border provides the perfect complement. The palazzos sport a partially elasticated waistband, ensuring a comfortable slip-on fit. This attire’s vibrant color palette and detailed craftsmanship make it an ideal choice for festive occasions. Hand wash is recommended to maintain its fabric quality and intricate patterns.

This elegant ensemble features a straight, calf-length kurta crafted from viscose rayon, adorned with intricate ethnic motif embroidery and sequin ornamentation on the yoke. The kurta has a classic round neck, regular three-quarter sleeves, and side slits, creating a graceful silhouette. Paired with solid trousers that offer a comfortable slip-on design, these bottoms are fabricated from viscose rayon as well and feature a partially elasticated waistband for added comfort. 

Completing the outfit is a delicate organza dupatta, beautifully embellished with embroidered patterns along the border, adding a subtle yet striking finishing touch. Perfect for festive occasions, this ready-to-wear set blends traditional aesthetics with contemporary style, ensuring you look sophisticated and elegant. This garment set is machine washable, making it convenient for regular use.

This exquisite ensemble features a floor-length Anarkali kurta crafted from luxurious Art Silk, showcasing a solid pattern with intricate floral designs. The kurta is styled with long, regular sleeves and a round neck, delivering an elegant and graceful look. The panelled design adds a touch of sophistication, while the flared hemline enhances the overall charm. The accompanying palazzos are also made from Art Silk and feature an elasticated waistband for a comfortable slip-on fit. The dupatta, adorned with self-design motifs and taping along the borders, complements the outfit perfectly. Ideal for festive occasions, this ready-to-wear set is both stylish and comfortable, recommending dry cleaning to maintain its pristine condition.

This vibrant Anarkali dress exudes elegance and festive charm, crafted from pure viscose rayon fabric for a comfortable yet luxurious feel. The bright, ankle-length garment showcases an intricate Bandhani print adorned with delicate Gotta Patti ornamentation, enhancing its ornate floral design and festive allure. The round neck and three-quarter sleeves with regular styling provide a classic touch, complementing the flattering flared hemline. The dress is ready to wear and woven meticulously through machine weave, making it perfect for festive occasions and bridal celebrations. Dry clean recommended to maintain the rich quality and intricate detailing of this stunning piece.

This exquisite ethnic ensemble exudes traditional elegance and is perfect for daily wear. The set features a calf-length, A-line kurta made from pure cotton, adorned with intricate ethnic motifs and characterized by a flattering V-neck. It is designed in a stunning Angrakha style, featuring three-quarter flared sleeves and a charming front slit, complemented by a flared hemline.

The matching palazzos, crafted from pure cotton, offer comfort with a partially elasticated waistband and slip-on closure. They showcase a delightful printed pattern that harmonizes beautifully with the kurta. 

Completing the look is a printed dupatta with a sophisticated taping border, also made from pure cotton, enhancing the ethnic charm of this attire. This ready-to-wear outfit is sustainable and easy to care for with machine wash instructions.

Perfect for adding a touch of traditional flair to your everyday wardrobe, this ensemble is a blend of style, comfort, and cultural heritage.

This elegant ensemble features a beautiful printed A-line kurta crafted from pure cotton fabric, ensuring comfort and breathability. The kurta boasts a round neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, with a floral pattern that adds a touch of charm. Complementing the kurta, the slip-on trousers, also made from pure cotton, display a matching printed design. The flared hemline of the calf-length kurta flows gracefully, enhancing its sophisticated appeal. 

Accompanying this outfit is a printed dupatta made from a cotton blend fabric that matches perfectly with the overall theme. The dupatta border, adorned with a delicate print, adds an extra layer of elegance to this daily wear. The elasticated waistband on the trousers ensures a comfortable fit. With machine-weave construction and screen printing technique, this ready-to-wear set is easy to maintain with machine wash care. Ideal for everyday occasions, this ensemble combines style and comfort effortlessly.

This festive ensemble features a vibrant Poly Georgette Sharara set embellished with exquisite thread work. The sleeveless top showcases a boat neck and an A-line shape, adorned with large geometric embroidered patterns, and hemmed straight above the knee. It effortlessly complements the flowy, elasticated waistband Sharara bottoms, which boast intricate embroidery and multiple slits for added flair. The set includes a matching embroidered Poly Georgette dupatta with elegant taping at the border. Designed with a layered styling and floral trendy accents, this ready-to-wear outfit is perfect for festive occasions, promising comfort with its regular fit and lightweight knitted weave pattern. Remember to dry clean for best care.

This elegant ensemble features a beautifully designed A-line kurta with a timeless floral print in rich hues, crafted from pure cotton for ultimate comfort. The boat neck and three-quarter regular sleeves enhance its graceful silhouette, while the panelled design and curved hemline add a touch of sophistication. The accompanying slip-on trousers, also made from pure cotton, boast a solid pattern and a partially elasticated waistband for a perfect fit. The outfit is complemented by a printed pure cotton dupatta with solid borders, enhancing the overall aesthetic with intricate patterns. The gotta patti ornamentation subtly embellishes the kurta, making it suitable for daily wear. Easy to care for with hand washing, this ready-to-wear set is ideal for both casual and elegant occasions.

Step into the festive season with this stunning three-piece ensemble. The vibrant pink kurta, crafted from soft Viscose Rayon, features intricate Gotta Patti ornamentation with a large floral embroidered pattern that covers most of its surface. The kurta showcases a round neck, three-quarter regular sleeves, side slits, and a straight hemline, extending to a graceful calf length. Complementing the kurta is a voluminous skirt, also made from Viscose Rayon, adorned with delicate embroidery and an adjustable drawstring closure for a perfect fit. Adding an elegant touch, the solid silk blend dupatta with taping around the edges completes the look, making this outfit an ideal choice for any festive occasion. Dry-cleaning is recommended to maintain its exquisite detailing. This ready-to-wear set combines traditional artistry with modern comfort, ensuring you look effortlessly chic.

Introducing a stunning three-piece ethnic ensemble perfect for festive occasions. The set includes a graceful kurta made from luxurious Art Silk fabric, featuring a straight, calf-length silhouette with a straight hemline. The kurta showcases an elegant yoke design on the front and a classic round neckline, accompanied by regular three-quarter sleeves with intricate detailing at the cuffs. 

The accompanying trousers, also crafted from Art Silk, boast a solid pattern and comfortable slip-on design with a partially elasticated waistband. 

Adding a touch of finesse, the set comes with a delicate Organza dupatta adorned with exquisite embroidery, bordered in a solid hue. The dupatta completes the look with its sheer elegance, making this outfit an exquisite choice for wedding guests and gifting. 

Embrace the beauty of traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design in this machine-washable, ready-to-wear attire.

This knee-length A-line dress, crafted from pure polyester, features a striking ethnic motifs print in a vibrant color palette. The everyday wear dress includes a flattering V-neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, providing a blend of comfort and style. Its straight hemline and side slits add a touch of sophistication, while two functional pockets enhance its practicality. The machine-washable fabric ensures easy maintenance, adhering to wardrobe essentials for daily use.

This elegant outfit features a beautifully printed calf-length kurta in a pastel colour family, crafted from pure cotton fabric. The ethnic motifs add a touch of traditional charm, while the keyhole neck and three-quarter regular sleeves enhance its classic yet stylish appeal. The straight shape and straight hemline with side slits offer both comfort and a flattering silhouette. Ideal for daily wear, this ready-to-wear kurta is best maintained with hand washing. Paired with vibrant yellow leggings, it makes for a chic and comfortable ensemble, perfect for any casual occasion.

This stunning festive ensemble is crafted from Poly Georgette fabric, showcasing intricate ethnic motifs in a small pattern coverage. The sleeveless kurti features a classic round neck and side slits, with a straight hemline that elegantly reaches knee length. The matching sharara bottoms are designed for effortless style with a slip-on closure and a partially elasticated waistband for added comfort. Completing the look, the printed dupatta with taping border beautifully complements the outfit. Adorned with sparkling sequins, this ready-to-wear set is perfect for wedding guests and festive celebrations, offering a blend of tradition and modernity with its vibrant color and exquisite detailing. Machine washable for easy care, this ensemble ensures you look impeccably stylish on special occasions.

This ensemble features a sophisticated kurta set crafted entirely from pure cotton, ensuring maximum comfort for daily wear. The straight kurta has a boat neck design and three-quarter regular sleeves, extending to a calf length with side slits, all in a solid black hue. The straight, solid black trousers are slip-on style with an elasticated waistband, providing both ease and simplicity. Accentuating the outfit is a printed pure cotton dupatta, adorned with vibrant patterns and finished with elegant tassel borders. With its effortless style and traditional charm, this ready-to-wear set strikes a perfect balance of modern aesthetics and cultural essence. Ideal for everyday wear, it offers a stylish yet comfortable option for any casual occasion.

This outfit is a stunning choice for festive occasions, comprising a pure cotton Anarkali kurta, printed trousers, and a voile dupatta. The kurta features a round neck, three-quarter regular sleeves, and is adorned with intricate thread work and ethnic motifs, giving it an elegant and traditional appeal. The empire design styling, flared hemline, and above-knee length add a touch of sophistication. The slip-on trousers are made from pure cotton and printed with intricate patterns to complement the kurta. The voile dupatta, also printed, has a beautiful printed border that enhances the overall look. With its hand wash care instructions, elasticated waistband, and machine weave type, this ready-to-wear ensemble combines practicality with style. This attire is ideal for guests and gifting during weddings and other festive celebrations.

This elegant daily wear dress features a striking bright colour palette adorned with a charming floral print, embodying the main trend of floral patterns. The calf-length A-line silhouette provides a flattering, flared hemline that adds a touch of sophistication to the overall look. Crafted from pure fabric with a regular machine weave, this ready-to-wear dress is designed for convenience and comfort. The round neckline and cap sleeves enhance the regular design styling, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Easy to care for with machine wash guidelines, this dress combines style and practicality seamlessly.

This image showcases a stunning outfit by Fashor, featuring a vibrant earthy-toned kurti in pure viscose rayon. The kurti boasts a captivating woven design adorned with ethnic motifs, lending it an elegant and traditional appeal. It features a round neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, offering comfortable wear for daily occasions. 

The straight silhouette and tiered design add a touch of sophistication, while the calf-length hemline and side slits enhance its modern elegance. The fabric’s intricate detailing and fine quality highlight the brand's commitment to superior craftsmanship. Paired with white trousers, the ensemble embodies versatility and style, making it perfect for both casual outings and special gatherings. 

Easy to care for, the garment is best maintained by following the wash care instructions to ensure longevity and color preservation. Hand wash with mild detergents, avoid wringing, and dry flat on a towel or hang to retain its pristine condition.

This elegant ensemble features an Anarkali-style kurta, designed with a pleated, flared hemline made from pure cotton fabric. The calf-length kurta boasts a round neckline and three-quarter regular sleeves, showcasing a beautiful embroidered pattern with ethnic motifs. The churidar bottom, also crafted from pure cotton, flaunts a printed design complemented by a convenient zip closure and a partially elasticated waistband. Completing the look is a printed dupatta with a matching pure cotton fabric and a printed border. Perfect for daily wear, the pastel-toned outfit adheres to sustainable practices and is ready to wear with its intricate screen technique. Machine wash for easy care.

This stunning Anarkali dress, crafted from pure Viscose Rayon, embodies festive elegance. It features a vibrant earthy hue with intricate ethnic motifs achieved through block printing. The ankle-length dress showcases a flared hemline and pleated design styling, providing a graceful silhouette. The V-neckline pairs beautifully with three-quarter, flared sleeves, adding a sophisticated touch. The garment includes a subtle front slit for ease of movement and is ready to wear. For care, follow the washcare label: use cold water and mild detergents for handwashing or a delicate machine wash setting, always wash inside-out, and avoid wringing or tumble drying. Choose dry cleaning for optimal maintenance. Perfect for special occasions, this pleated Anarkali dress combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design.

This vibrant cotton kurta in a bright color exudes charm and comfort, perfect for daily wear. Designed with a pure cotton fabric, it features a geometric printed pattern that enhances its aesthetic appeal. The kurta falls to a calf-length and showcases a straight hemline, providing a sleek silhouette. It comes with a V-neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, adding to its classic style. The side slits offer ease of movement while the overall straight shape of the garment ensures a flattering fit. Machine washable and ready to wear, this piece is a practical and stylish addition to any wardrobe.

This elegant straight kurta set is a perfect blend of traditional and contemporary style, ideal for festive occasions. The ensemble features a calf-length kurta crafted from a luxurious silk blend fabric. It showcases exquisite embroidery work on a solid floral patterned base, complemented by a round neckline and regular three-quarter sleeves. Side slits add a touch of modernity to the traditional straight hemline design.

Paired with matching trousers made from the same silk blend fabric, the bottom features a comfortable drawstring closure. The set is completed with a coordinated poly chiffon dupatta that features a self-design and taping border, providing a contrast in bright color to the darker hue of the kurta and trousers. 

Dry clean only to maintain the texture and quality of the garment. This ready-to-wear outfit is perfect for parties or festive celebrations, making you look stylish and elegant.

Introducing our stunning Bandhani-Printed Cotton Dress, a perfect addition to your daily wear collection. This elegant ensemble features a vibrant Bright color palette and intricate Gotta Patti ornamentation, adding a touch of traditional charm. Crafted from pure, breathable cotton, it ensures comfort throughout the day. The dress boasts a calf-length straight hemline with side slits for ease of movement, and the regular weave pattern enhances its appeal.

Designed with a round neck and three-quarter regular sleeves, this ready-to-wear piece is easy to style and versatile. The straight silhouette flatters a variety of body shapes, while the machine-weave Bandhani technique adds uniqueness to each piece. Easy to maintain with hand wash care instructions, this outfit is both practical and stylish. Perfect for daily occasions, it seamlessly blends tradition with contemporary design.

This elegant outfit features a beautiful A-Line Kurti with a keyhole neck adorned with intricate Gotta Patti ornamentation, showcasing a stunning floral embroidered pattern. The three-quarter regular sleeves add a touch of sophistication, while the multiple slits ensure comfort and ease of movement. Crafted from soft and sustainable viscose rayon, the top hemline is curved and sits above the knee for a modern look.

Complementing the kurti is a pair of stylish sharara pants made from viscose rayon in a self-design pattern, secured by a convenient zip and elasticated waistband for a perfect fit. The solid Poly Chiffon dupatta with taping border completes the ensemble, adding an elegant drape. Perfect for daily wear, this ready-to-wear set in trending pastel shades is machine washable for easy care.

This ensemble features a chic and comfortable kurta-palazzo set, ideal for daily wear. The top is a calf-length, A-line kurta made from soft Viscose Rayon with a stylish round neck and three-quarter regular sleeves. It exhibits a printed ethnic motif pattern with mirror work ornamentation, creating a sophisticated yet traditional look. The straight hemline and side slits add to its elegance and ease of movement.

The bottom is a slip-on palazzo crafted from lightweight Viscose Rayon, featuring beautiful embroidered designs near the hem. The partially elasticated waistband ensures a comfortable fit. Both garments are machine weave and machine wash, offering ease of care and durability. This ready-to-wear set perfectly blends comfort with traditional aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to your daily wardrobe.

Elevate your fusion wardrobe with this exquisite three-piece set crafted from pure cotton. Care for me instructions:
- Dry cleaning is recommended.
- Use cold water with mild detergents when handwashing or opt for delicate setting when machine washing.
- Always wash inside-out to preserve color.
- Never wring or tumble dry. Dry flat on a towel or hang on coat hangers.
- Iron on the reverse side with medium heat.
